Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located within the Penn Warner Industrial Park, surrounded by a dynamic concentration of infill logistics and light industrial facilities positioned within approximately one mile of an interchange between US Routes 13 and 1. 2 Geoffrey Drive offers convenient access to major arteries including I-95, I-295 and the Pennsylvania Turnpike (I-276) – all located within 10 miles.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
2 Geoffrey Drive is located in Fairless Hills, Bucks County, PA and offers 64,199 rentable square feet of functional, bulk logistics space. Multiple points of ingress/
egress for the building provide streamlined traffic flow. Expansive parking capacity
as-is, with 110 car and 40 trailer parking spaces across the property. Loading on multiple sides of the building provide flexibility for tenant/client/customer
configurations.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 64,199 SF Available for Q2 2022 Occupancy | Rail Served

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located within the Penn Warner Industrial Park, surrounded by a dynamic concentration of infill logistics and light industrial facilities positioned within approximately one mile of an interchange between US Routes 13 and 1. 1 Geoffrey Drive offers convenient access to major arteries including I-95, I-295 and the Pennsylvania Turnpike (I-276) – all located within 10 miles.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
1 Geoffrey Drive is located in Fairless Hills, Bucks County, PA and offers 415,000
rentable square feet of functional, bulk logistics space. Multiple points of ingress/ egress for the building and full building circulation provide streamlined traffic flow.
Expansive parking capacity as-is, with 120 car and 330 van parking spaces.
Loading on multiple sides of each building provide flexibility for tenant/client/
customer configurations.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text:
The first building to deliver in 2021 will be Building #13 which will stand at 420,000 SF and offer 100' clear height. River Pointe Commerce Park, a 725-acre industrial park located is in Upper Mount Bethel, Pennsylvania owned by River Pointe Logistics (RPL). Current plans depict 15-buildings, totaling 6 million sq. ft. however, the developer is in a unique position that allows the layout of buildings to change to suit an array of industrial uses and is open to providing everything from build-to-suite lease or sale options to entitled pad site sales.
River Pointe Logistics Park is located just 1.5 miles to I-80, Exit 4 and is 66 miles to the port of NJ/NY. 80 miles to the port of Philadelphia.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Industrial Building for Lease in Bethlehem, PA

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
East Valley Logistics Park is a brand-new, master planned industrial park to be
developed by NorthPoint Development. This Class-A industrial development is located on the East side of the Lehigh Valley with quick connections to PA Rt. 33 and I-78.This ideal location provides tenants the ability to quickly and efficiently service the NYC/New Jersey metro areas and the entire mid-Atlantic region. East Valley Logistics Park is well-positioned for tenants to tap into the Lehigh Valley’s strong labor market.

Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: 370,400 SF available in this 1,088,000 SF warehouse. 40 docks, 1 grade level door, 70 trailer parking spaces, 195 vehicle parking spaces and 40' clear height.

This 925,910 SF cross-dock distribution facility is pad ready and estimated to be complete in Q4 2021. The site is situated in the Lehigh Valley industrial market with access to a strong local workforce. The location provides easy access to major transportation arteries like I-78, I-80, and I-476.
